functions.name: isMandated
functions.function: Check if an address is chain mandated to carry out important changes
inputHelp: Address of the entity to check

functions.name: admin_relinquish
functions.function: Has the admin relinquished control of the chain to decentralization

functions.name: addVoter
functions.function: To add a voter to the EX Blockchain
inputHelp: Address of the party to add. Only the admin or a vote of stakeholders can execute this function.

functions.name: removeVoter
functions.function: To remove a voter to the EX Blockchain
inputHelp: Address of the party to remove. Only the admin or a vote of stakeholders can execute this function.

functions.name: isVoter
functions.function: Check if an address is a voter on the chain
inputHelp: Address of the entity to check

functions.name: isXEX
functions.function: Check if an address is XEX's address
inputHelp: Address of the entity to check

functions.name: isOracle
functions.function: Check if an address is Oracle's address
inputHelp: Address of the entity to check

functions.name: relinquishAdminControl
functions.function: To relinquish admin's control for decentralization. Only admin can run

functions.name: getTruAt
functions.function: Get Chain's TruCode's address by index

functions.name: getAccAt
functions.function: Get Chain's Account's address by index
